page.title: 01HOBY,THRUSSINGTON & ROTHERBY
page.content:
This area is part of rural Leicestershire. It consists mainly of farmland & small villages & the valley of the River Wreake.
Hoby is a small village with a lot of grassland. Hoby is on a little hill on the side of the river valley. There is a church & some houses & a couple of cottages ,a shop,a post office & a Field Study Centre.
Rotherby is a small village with a church ,a couple of long green houses, some houses & a lot of farmland around it.
Thrussington is like a small town because it is big & wide & there are a lot of houses & pubs. There is a lot of farmland around Thrussington.
